title: World of Statistics on Twitter: "Worst air quality and pollution city ...
body: "Worst air quality and pollution city ranking: 1. 🇦🇪 Dubai 2. 🇵🇰 Karachi 3. 🇶🇦 Doha 4. 🇮🇩 Jakarta 5. 🇮🇳 Delhi 6. 🇿🇦 Johannesburg 7. 🇨🇳 Shanghai 8. 🇨🇱 Santiago 9. 🇰🇼 Kuwait City 10. 🇵🇪 Lima . 13. 🇲🇽 Mexico City 14. 🇺🇸 Washington D.C. 15. 🇺🇸 New York 17. 🇳🇱 Rotterdam 18. 🇺🇸…"
